definition: human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
COVID-19, the coronavirus disease identified in 2019
pinyin: er4 ling2 yi1 jiu3 guan1 zhuang4 bing4 du2 bing4
ren2 lei4 ru3 tu1 bing4 du2
ren2 lei4 mian3 yi4 que1 xian4 bing4 du2
dan1 chun2 pao4 zhen3 bing4 du2

sentences.english: The existing vaccines can only reduce the amount of virus, rather than totally inactivating it.
sentences.chinese: 当前的疫苗只会减少病毒数量，并非真正杀灭病毒。

sentences.english: The existing vaccines can only reduce the amount of virus, rather than totally inactivating it.
sentences.chinese: 当前的疫苗只会减少病毒数量，并非真正杀灭病毒。

sentences.english: You can get the norwalk virus from hand to mouth activity or from contaminated food.
sentences.chinese: 你可以得到手诺瓦克病毒污染的食物或活动口。

sentences.english: Virus-infected emails struck fear into the Microsoft Company.
sentences.chinese: 携带病毒的电子邮件引起了微软公司的恐慌。

sentences.english: They run rampant with spyware and viruses.
sentences.chinese: 他们与间谍软件和病毒狼狈为奸。

sentences.english: There is a little bit of information of swine hepatitis E virus in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 在泰国，有少量关于猪戊型肝炎病毒的信息。

sentences.english: The reason flu keeps infecting us again and again is that the virus is constantly changing.
sentences.chinese: 流感能够反复感染我们的原因在于病毒的不断变化。

sentences.english: Adenoviruses have been modified to carry parts of the HIV virus.
sentences.chinese: 腺病毒经过改良以携带HIV病毒部件。

sentences.english: Adenoviruses have been modified to carry parts of the HIV virus.
sentences.chinese: 腺病毒经过改良以携带HIV病毒部件。

sentences.english: The capsid architecture is an important feature to consider in the characterization of viruses.
sentences.chinese: 衣壳构造是考虑病毒的一个重要方面。

sentences.english: Thymidine kinase gene is found in herpes simplex virus.
sentences.chinese: 胸苷激酶基因被发现在单纯疱疹病毒。

sentences.english: Try to drink plenty of water or electrolyte fluids to get rid of stomach virus.
sentences.chinese: 为了消除肠胃感染病毒，要喝大量的水或电解质液体。

sentences.english: The first test they did was with a virus dose of one nanogram.
sentences.chinese: 他们做先将1纳克剂量的病毒做为实验的第一步。

sentences.english: The virus triggered myocarditis, a serious inflammation of the heart muscle.
sentences.chinese: 这些病毒引发心肌炎，对心脏肌肉造成严重的炎症。

sentences.english: Into the camp, blood tests found Lee's living with HIV in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 进劳教所时，抽血化验查出李的血液中携带艾滋病毒。

definition: HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
